availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah Steven Cannan (Perry co., IL, and Caldwell Co. KY resident)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, and Perry County, Illinois, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy E. Cannan. Stepfather of John N. Edmonson Cannan. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Perry County, Illinois, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 292B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Perry County, Township 4, Range 1 W, p. 13.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, Precinct 7, p. 447A.
"Elijah Steven Cannan (1840-1926)," Find A Grave, Memorial #19259225, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19259225 (accessed June 22, 2021).
